meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a typical man or male
meanings.sent1: He wore a blokeish plaid shirt to the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The blokeish handshake he gave was firm and confident.
meanings.sent3: The blokeish way he tried to fix the leaky faucet only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: His blokeish sense of humor always lightened the mood in the office.
meanings.sent5: The blokeish scent of aftershave lingered in the room long after he left.

meanings.definition: Displaying qualities or behaviors typically associated with men
meanings.sent1: Her blokeish attitude towards sports surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: He had a blokeish love for classic cars and motorcycles.
meanings.sent3: The blokeish way he snored could be heard from the next room.
meanings.sent4: His blokeish determination to finish the race inspired others to push harder.
meanings.sent5: The blokeish way he rolled up his sleeves before starting work showed his readiness.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or mannerisms of a man
meanings.sent1: The blokeish voice on the phone sounded authoritative.
meanings.sent2: She found his blokeish sense of chivalry endearing.
meanings.sent3: His blokeish habit of leaving socks on the floor drove her crazy.
meanings.sent4: The blokeish way he stood with hands on hips exuded confidence.
meanings.sent5: The blokeish grin on his face showed he was pleased with the outcome.
